lead_paragraph: Manager Roberto Martinez said he understands why his future as Everton manager is under scrutiny and asked disgruntled fans to stay behind the team despite their disappointing campaign.

headline.print_headline: Everton's Martinez Understands 'Scrutiny', Asks Fans for Unity
headline.main: Everton's Martinez Understands 'Scrutiny', Asks Fans for Unity

snippet: Manager Roberto Martinez said he understands why his future as Everton manager is under scrutiny and asked disgruntled fans to stay behind the team despite their disappointing campaign....
